comment: * Information about how to respond to an incoming call.

methods.name: public boolean getDisallowCall()
methods.comment: * @return Whether the incoming call should be blocked.

methods.name: public boolean getRejectCall()
methods.comment:
* @return Whether the incoming call should be disconnected as if the user had manually
         * rejected it.

methods.name: public boolean getSilenceCall()
methods.comment: * @return Whether the ringtone should be silenced for the incoming call.

methods.name: public boolean getSkipCallLog()
methods.comment: * @return Whether the incoming call should not be displayed in the call log.

methods.name: public boolean getSkipNotification()
methods.comment: * @return Whether a missed call notification should not be shown for the incoming call.

methods.name: public boolean getShouldScreenCallViaAudioProcessing()
methods.comment:
* @return Whether we should enter the {@link Call#STATE_AUDIO_PROCESSING} state to allow
         * for further screening of the call.
         * @hide
